directions: Combine cream cheese and butter in a microwave-safe bowl; heat in microwave until mostly melted, about 30 seconds. Add corn, jalapeno peppers, cumin, and garlic powder to cream cheese mixture.
Heat mixture in microwave until warm, 1 to 2 minutes.
ingredients: 1 (15.25 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
title: Hot and Creamy Jalapeno Corn Dip
